name: ugh
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to express a strong feeling of disgust (= disapproval and dislike) at something very unpleasant: Ugh, I think I stepped in something really gross. Ugh, I'm not eating that!

Linguistics: sounds used as interjections

Add to word list
Add to word list
the written form of the sound people sometimes use to express a strong feeling of disgust at something very unpleasant: Ugh, that smells really bad!
